task_1.description: Sort colored cups by color into designated zones
task_1.required_objects: colored cups (red, blue, green, yellow), color-coded zones (e.g., labeled containers)
task_1.initial_setup: A mix of colored cups randomly placed on the table; color-coded zones are empty and positioned nearby.

task_2.description: Use a permanent marker to draw a symbol on a paper cup
task_2.initial_setup: A paper cup and marker are placed on the table; a blank surface (e.g., a piece of paper) is available for reference.

task_3.description: Fold a tissue into a specific shape (e.g., a square or triangle)
task_3.initial_setup: A single tissue is placed flat on the table.

task_4.description: Assemble a stack of cups in a specific order (e.g., size or color sequence)
task_4.required_objects: cups of varying sizes and colors
task_4.initial_setup: Cups are scattered on the table in a random arrangement.

task_5.description: Use the gripper to pick up a cup, apply the marker to its surface, and place it in a designated location
task_5.required_objects: cup, permanent marker, target location (e.g., a marked spot on the table)
task_5.initial_setup: A cup and marker are on the table; the target location is clearly marked.
